thread.title: Stories behind Warriors’ 118-101 loss in Portland
thread.title_full: Stories behind Warriors’ 118-101 loss in Portland - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Rusty Simmons
title: Stories behind Warriors’ 118-101 loss in Portland
text:
Photo: Steve Dykes, Associated Press Portland Trail Blazers guard Damian Lillard (0) drives to the basket on Golden State Warriors guard Stephen Curry (30) during the second half of a preseason NBA basketball game in Portland, Ore., Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. (AP Photo/Steve Dykes) Portland Trail Blazers guard Damian Lillard (0) drives to the...
PORTLAND - Stephen Curry poured in 30 points and dished out seven assists to two turnovers in less than 26 minutes, and Klay Thompson and Draymond Green each added 14 points in the Warriors’ 118-101 exhibition loss to the Trail Blazers on Thursday. Portland Trail Blazers guard Damian Lillard (0) drives to the basket on Golden State Warriors guard Stephen Curry (30) during the second half of a preseason NBA basketball game in Portland, Ore., Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. (AP Photo/Steve Dykes) Portland Trail Blazers guard Damian Lillard (0) drives to the...
PORTLAND - Stephen Curry poured in 30 points and dished out seven assists to two turnovers in less than 26 minutes, and Klay Thompson and Draymond Green each added 14 points in the Warriors’ 118-101 exhibition loss to the Trail Blazers on Thursday.
